intro: Jensoa, commonly known as the "butterfly plant," is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its striking, butterfly-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pink and purple. Jensoa thrives in humid, shaded environments and requires well-drained soil to flourish. Its unique appearance makes it a popular choice for ornamental gardening.
